mapper.sql: USER_CODE, USER_NAME, MOBILE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, USER_TYPE, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, CANCEL_DATE, GMT_CREATED, GMT_MODIFIED, CREATOR, OPERATOR, USER_STATUS, LOCK_STATUS, USER_PWD, CARD_TYPE, CARD_NO, REMARK

select
distinct
from fs_sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fs_sys_user (USER_CODE, USER_NAME, MOBILE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, USER_TYPE, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, CANCEL_DATE, GMT_CREATED, GMT_MODIFIED, CREATOR, OPERATOR, USER_STATUS, LOCK_STATUS, USER_PWD, CARD_TYPE, CARD_NO, REMARK) values (#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cancelDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
